name: Scratch - A Platformer
description:
(Not Mobile Friendly)

Level 2 Is Possible

Hint: Down With The Small Guy

THIS GAME WAS MADE IN SCRATCH
If you would like to use scratch go to scratch.mit.edu 

Jump on blocks to activate them as you help Scratch Cat navigate his way through the Scratch Editor to help Sparky on his way home!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Controls
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
-Arrow Keys or WASD to Move
-E to activate certain blocks
-1-3 / click to select block in Inventory
-P to pause game
-N to go to the next music track

SANDBOX MODE
-m to toggle placing blocks
-scroll to select blocks
-click and drag blocks to reposition them

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Scratch was the thing I used to make this.

Music from scratch

Everything else by me
